name: X/Twitter Search Latest
description: Function to search for the most recent tweets on Twitter based on a query string.
author: Shinkai

apiKey.description: This is the equivalent of the X-RapidAPI-Key header required to authenticate with the Twitter API. More information can be found here: https://rapidapi.com/twttrapi-twttrapi-default/api/twttrapi

query.description: The search query for fetching tweets.

data.description: Array of Tweet objects returned from the API.

text.description: The text content of the tweet.

name.description: The name of the user who posted the tweet.

handle.description: The Twitter handle of the user.

createdAt.description: The timestamp of when the tweet was created.

error.description: Error message if the fetching failed.
